topic.title: Hello!
topic.body: I'm new to Zeronet and would like to get to know you guys. I do music remixes on YouTube. Also, I have a micro nation if anyone is willing to join and a few projects such as a game engine (a clone) of Game Maker 1.4x's UNDERTALE. If anyone can help please shoot a message at my zeroid id! Thanks and I hope to get to know you all. As I am tired of mainstream social media and am looking for alternatives
